website_summaries.verdict: The latest and greatest dinosaur robot toy eagerly chases after its ball, busts a groove to your music, eagerly eats when fed, and that’s just the start of what Miposaur can do.
pros: Control and train Miposaur via its companion app, hand gestures, or with its included Trackball
cons: AA and AAA batteries not included

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last - broken within a few months
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved this when it was new but within 6 months one of the wheels failed and it is now pretty much useless. It wasn't used intensively, regularly but not intensively. For such an expensive toy I expected more. Amazon provide no option to return it. Woowwee (manufacturer) say they only give a 90 day warranty. So not a lot we can do. A real shame because it was a lot of fun. (Review written by husband of buyer.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! Opened it this morning as it's my sons 6th birthday - he's had so much fun with it this morning and I already have the MiPosaur app on my phone! It's well worth the money - both my son & my daughter are amazed by this product! Plus I am to:D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed in under 4 hours use.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately worked for a day. Now have a disappointed five year old who thinks Santa brings him shoddy toys. It appears to have failed so no longer balances and just goes crazy instead of staying still. Have arranged for its return.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Allen

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: It's one of them things, he loved it initially and now it is somewhere in the house not used. Personally I wish I had been more stronger and not bought this item. It's OK but doesn't keep them entertained for long...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. Hasan

customer_reviews.title: Badly made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as Christmas present for my nephew. Only after playing less than 10 mins it's tail came off !! Luckily we managed to fix it but this is not something that you would expect from such an expensive toy. He likes it so that's why I gave 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: BeeMavis

customer_reviews.title: Great fun easy to work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson at Christmas, he loved it Definitely the best toy that he had for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: but it looks brilliant and I can't wait to play with it myself
customer_reviews.text: Can only comment on the arrival (prompt) and packaging (excellent). Present for grandson, but it looks brilliant and I can't wait to play with it myself!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: excited
customer_reviews.text: christmas present. can't wait to try it out with my son
customer_reviews.author: mummy g

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: My 5yr old son loves it. He can now use miposaur to interact with his elder brother's mip. Very clever toy 👍
customer_reviews.author: Simon McDermott

customer_reviews.title: bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great toy and great price on amazon (look for the offers)
customer_reviews.author: sychnant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for money my kids ages range from 6-16 and all find this a good toy
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Go for it. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy. Solid and smart. I would buy it again for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Marius Lica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year Nephew at Christmas. He loves it, we all had great fun with it. My nephew enjoyed rolling the ball around to get the dinosaur to follow it, he laughed when the dinosaur became angry not being able to catch the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: The kid went wild with the MiPossaur. So far, it's impressive and corresponds to what i've read and seen in the reviews. Robot and dinossaur? All a 9 year old kid loves... :)
customer_reviews.author: Tito Gonçalves

customer_reviews.title: Childrens favourite Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this. Only thing is it uses newer Bluetooth so it works from my phone but not my old iPad. Of course you can use clapping and the ball also so they can still have loads of play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gem0

customer_reviews.title: Great we all love miposaur
customer_reviews.text: Great we all love miposaur, he does go through the batteries, but hes a fab toy love the app and love how he chases after his ball
customer_reviews.author: keeley neville

customer_reviews.title: Great pet robot
customer_reviews.text: Great little toy. Fun and easy to use with the trackball. Clapping hands not so effective. Puts a smile on the face of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Les Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Has entertained my son and various relatives for some time
customer_reviews.author: DrN

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't always follow the commands but great for young dinosaur enthusiasts!
customer_reviews.author: Abi B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quite good fun for what it is. My son not too fussed either way after first ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Daley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson for xma's he thinks it brill.
customer_reviews.author: r merifield

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for my 8 year old, works ok with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Mr K Moodley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This robot really doesn't disappoint! My 7 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic amazing toy.Christmas present for our grandson who is dinosaur crazy.It is his best friend.!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A fun to play with, both a joy for my husband and my four years old.
customer_reviews.author: JWJ

customer_reviews.title: ... a bit of patience for kids to train but excellent toy for my 8 yo
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of patience for kids to train but excellent toy for my 8 yo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, would be nice if it was rechargeable ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toy,would be nice if it was rechargeable as it requires lots of batteries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in plenty of time. Christmas present for my Grandson. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet frances Soffe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quite hard to work at first app a bit hit and miss
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy and seems to be good value
customer_reviews.text: Really smart robot. I was very surprised that it could chase the ball. I bought this for my son and a Kitty Zoomer at twice the price for my daughter. The build quality and fun is equivalent, so I think this is priced very reasonably by comparison. It also seems pretty robust as my son has given it some hammer since Christmas Day!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H. Monk

customer_reviews.title: Cool for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, my 7 year old can control it with ease, using app on phone or without. The dinosaur acts like a dog when you do the 'chase the ball' mood which is very sweet, it seems like a creature not a plastic toy at times find myself saying 'ah' at it!
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Novel and cool - like how it can be used in different ways, including apps on phone.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fun, has been played with by old and young
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good product, the ball that it chases and befriends ...
customer_reviews.text: A good product, the ball that it chases and befriends is excellent. The app on an iPod worked well, although it took a while for my son (12) to work out how to control it remotely, without it just spinning around.
customer_reviews.author: IJS

customer_reviews.title: An amazing toy!
customer_reviews.text: The Miposaur is an amazing interactive toy and there is plenty of fun when taming it. I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Momchil S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work good. Besides, it needs a lot of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Burak Saltan

customer_reviews.title: Got this for our 7 year old grandson. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 7 year old grandson. He loves it. His brother has the MiP robot. They are having a blast with how the two robots interact.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for Xmas present it came damaged. Looking forward as the young man want it it badly.
customer_reviews.author: RD Silva

customer_reviews.title: shame
customer_reviews.text: marks scratches, batterd plastic, scuff mark, abrasions, lots, i couldnt put more pictures, is shame to to give something like it for bithday gift. Leg & head just fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and fun!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, amazing? Fabulous? Well the kids love him!! He is pretty amazing!!! We have MIP as well and the two are fab together although miposaur is my fave!! He is just too cool and so much fun!!! We got him here half price but at full price, he is worth every single penny, I would have paid it!! Funny when miposaur chases MIP!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L. Munn

customer_reviews.title: 2 hours of fun. Sat in a cupboard since.
customer_reviews.text: Loads of fun for kids I can imagine. I'm 30 and loved this as a concept. Loved it for a couple of hours, then grew bored of it and never touched it again. Unless you have kids to entertain, spend the money on a food shop!
customer_reviews.author: Clyde V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. We have had several remote control toys ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We have had several remote control toys and this is the best. You actually feel as if he is your pet, he has a real personality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... out but my 9 yr old son certainly has enjoyed playing with this
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of practice to work out but my 9 yr old son certainly has enjoyed playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachaelliphillips

customer_reviews.title: Advanced present for a dinosaur nut!
customer_reviews.text: Can't offer real feedback yet as it's an advanced birthday present for my grandson but I'm sure he'll love it when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointing. Doesn't function, as promised. Nearly all features do not work as intended. Just realised that I am even too late for returning :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My kids received the Miposaur as a Christmas gift this morning, and I must say, I am incredibly impressed and smitten with this little guy. The instructions are straightforward, the battery compartments are easy to get to, and the personality of the miposaur will have you falling in love. The ball that the miposaur comes with has different settings. For instance, the music setting causes Miposaur to beat box and dance. The teddy bear setting has Miposaur "awwing" over the cuteness of the bear. Best of all, Miposaur can track the ball, follow it around, and bat at it with his tail and hands. Hands down one of the best presents my kids have received!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Van Gorden

customer_reviews.title: Cute robot dinosaur with lots of personality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this along with the white and black MiP robots for our sons for Christmas. The Miposaur had an edge over the robots in that it has more of a personality. It also stays upright more easily, leaning on either his tail or his arms instead of falling over. My son loved carrying the trackball and watching his Miposaur follow him around as if on a leash. Like the robots, it was lots of fun at first to watch it dance and interact with you, but after a few days it wasn't played with a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: CMichel

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun and durable
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 3 year old grandson for Christmas 2017 - 3 is too young to do much on his own (other than throw the ball), but his father really enjoyed it, and father/son interactive play is always great. The Miposaur has been living for almost a year in a house with two kids under age 5 and he has so far survived! My grandson still loves to play with it and as he gets older he discovers new things it can do. Miposaur will make the whole family laugh and want to get in on the act of discover what this robotic dino is capable of!
customer_reviews.author: Sue H.

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love chasing Mippy's ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids last year for Christmas and "Mippy" still works as well as he did a year ago! We sometimes turn Mippy on in front of our dogs and they are kept entertained for awhile. The dogs love chasing Mippy's ball, but get freaked out when Mippy comes too. Hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Limited interaction
customer_reviews.text: Cool pet. Wish it had a guard mode. It will follow you, chase the ball, cuddle the ball, dance, beat box, and eat with the ball. Have to shake the ball to get Dino to interact with it. Can't get the hand jesters to work out but the ball interaction is good. My 4 year old likes it but isn't as crazy about it as I thought he'd be.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! They each bought a robot with their own money, my 8 year old bought the Miposaur and my 7 year old bought the Robosapien X. The Miposaur doesn't have as many sounds or features, but it chases the ball and dances around which my older son loves. The Robosapien has a fairly easy to use controller and dances, talks, karate chops, and does lots of basic things. Perfect for my younger son.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's cool and a good concept, however it doesn't really do too much other than roam around and make noise. The controls via the app are not very good as you can only either turn it or move forward at any given time. The pathing doesn't really work either and there is a latency between actions.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product during the holidays on one of Amazon's "deal of the day" sales. My kids have had hours of fun playing with their Miposaur, playing fetch and teaching him tricks. It was a little quirky at first to get used to, but isn't all technology. love the product and love the amazon pricing.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherN

customer_reviews.title: NEVER DIES!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toy. The responses are a bit off but still extremely fun to play with. This runs excellent when connected to a smartphone. Fun for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom Named Susan

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I received a USED Miposaur and not a BRAND ...
customer_reviews.text: My miposaur did not respond to all commands and based on the box and the reaction of the robot; I felt like I received a USED Miposaur and not a BRAND NEW one. I've used a friend's Miposaur and have seen one that has adapted to the owner's voice AND it was really responsive to everything it was advertised to do. Ultimately just returned it as I didn't want to pay all that money for a used Miposaur.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this totally off reviews for my soon to be 6 year old grand son. Just returned from his party and what a hit this toy was. He quickly wanted to open it and it had easy to understand instructions. He loved it, it is just so cute and responds to the commands as in the directions. He will play with this for hours. A great choice and appears well made for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Tetum Burnell

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old girl loves here miposaur that she got for Christmas. I bought this toy because i wanted her to have a dino toy that really moved and stuff, i never bought something like this before,but im glade i did. She has fun with it all the time no complaints here
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kids enjoy it and the various settings keep things interesting
customer_reviews.text: It works well! The kids enjoy it and the various settings keep things interesting. It's easy to remember the different settings because the little ball has pictures to indicate what each setting is (e.g., "food"). The MiP Robot, by comparison, is hard for even an adult to figure out because the light colors are hard to remember, so you need the instructions handy.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work the best on carpet🤔
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool toy, but my son lost interest really fast, as it doesn’t work well on carpet and that’s basically all we have in our home right now... it’s fun, but it would be a lot more enjoyable if we had wood or tile flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Very Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 1/2 YO Grandson was thrilled to get this for Christmas. The multiple features kept him entertained for all of Christmas week. Asked him last week if he is still playing with it and he said absolutely every day. It is an interesting toy to use and even adults find the technology pretty advanced. Would recommend for entertainment value for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: tracy webb

customer_reviews.title: Miposaur was a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Miposaur was a hit. My 9 year old really liked this gift and my 15 year old wanted in on the action. After Christmas we were in the stores looking for the Mip Robot so Miposaur could have a play partner. They work very well together and it is great how you can control and interact to it with claps or motions or the track ball or a phone app. Very fun toy with nice technology like the battle and follow modes. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Speed711

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, kids love it & shipped quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, kids really enjoy it. I have two boys, one is 5 and the other is 12. Was easy to download the app. Exceeded our expectations! Also was shipped quicker than we were originally told, so that was a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: All of my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This toy is awesome! We bought my son a MIP robot last Christmas. It was cute but not that special and, while he like it, grew a little bored. It also had trouble connecting to the app. I bought this only because it was so highly rated. I was skeptical after his experience with the MIP. I am so glad we bought this for him! It is so cute! It acts like a dog and chases the ball, it dances, it battles, and it can follow you around. We ended up buying 3 of these (1 for each kid) because it was such a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Sunndays in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: How to train your pet dragon...err miposaur.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dinosaur obsessed 6 year old for his birthday and he loves it. We put the app on his iPad and he loves to feed the miposaur and put him in battle mode. He's not super responsive to the hand gestures. You have to be right in front of him at his level but he does very well with the app or track ball. My son is very happy playing for an hour or more straight with this if I let him.
customer_reviews.author: Tyfani

customer_reviews.title: So far this has been a very fun toy for all my kids ages 15 - 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a very fun toy for all my kids ages 15 - 2 (2 needs supervision). Really neat "pet" and directions are pretty clear to get it up and running. The kids and adults have fun with this. I give it 4 instead of 5 because some of the "hand directions" to make it move don't seem to pick up in the sensor. It is still very entertaining. Battery life seems decent so far.
customer_reviews.author: Carlena Wallace

customer_reviews.title: the free app that you can control it from you iPhone is awesome. The intelligence built into it is great
customer_reviews.text: So I totally thought this would be a gimmicky toy for my 8 year old. No way! He loves it, the free app that you can control it from you iPhone is awesome. The intelligence built into it is great. For any of you that have a boy (or girl) that loves dinosaurs this is totally worth the money to get them this. He has played with it nonstop since Christmas and takes it everywhere. I'm impressed with way it works too. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Platypus

customer_reviews.title: Too life-like for some
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my adult son. He enjoyed it, but didn't play with it for long. It turned out to be too life-like and scared the cat who allows us to live with it. He had to choose. This should not be a reflection on the Miposaur, which seems to be a great little device.
customer_reviews.author: fuel2u

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is cool but not worth the money. His tail constantly falls off, and he cannot balance on his own very well. We have two of these, and I think this thing is not much bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper610

customer_reviews.title: It was s lot of fun for an hour
customer_reviews.text: It was s lot of fun for an hour. Noticed it didn't get unloaded from the car on our return from grandma's. She is probably too old at 13 --- but when she remembers the cats haven't seen it yet, well then I am sure it will get more play. 10 and under, Dino lover? A must have The tail is great how it moves!
customer_reviews.author: J. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure he's going to love it. I almost want to get one for ...
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with three of my grandkids who live in Washington. They spent hours playing with the Miposaur, getting it to chase the ball, feeding it and taking it for walks. I also bought another one for one of the grandkids that lives locally and will be excited to see his reaction. I'm sure he's going to love it. I almost want to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ken and Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Loved it- A huge Hit in the House
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up to the phone easily. Needs to be disconnected from the phone to use the ball, that threw us off for a bit :) 14 year old boy training it and treating it like a pet. Would buy more at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Thatsthegoodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Miposaur robotic friend
customer_reviews.text: This guy is so much fun you'll want a dozen of them, and the dancing is the best. All modes work well, but no details because you'll want to explore them yourself. Gesture controls can be a bit fiddly, but the ball remote is as much a part of the experience as the toy itself and makes the Miposaur seem even more like a pet than a product.
customer_reviews.author: Ennery

customer_reviews.title: Won’t connect to my iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: My son has wanted this for two years and finally got it as his main Christmas present. It is fun to play with but we are really disappointed that it won’t connect to my iPhone X. It seems like it should be updated to match the technology.
customer_reviews.author: jbarry

customer_reviews.title: I actually like it a lot more than Zoomer
customer_reviews.text: We have a Zoomer, so I was skeptical of the Miposaur. So far, I actually like it a lot more than Zoomer.. and my son does as well. I didn't like that it took AA and AAA batteries at first, however I don't have to worry about plugging it into a USB port like Zoomer. I guess this could be looked at as a pro or a con, but i'm leaning more towards it being a pro, since I can replace the batteries with my own rechargables
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Love chasing the ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a big win in holiday gifts!! Brought is for my 3 year old son and it is really fascinating. He paid with the ball mostly and we have used the app. Driving on the app was a little hard because it takes 2 fingers- one for left right other forward or backward. Love chasing the ball. Acts more like a dog than a dinosaur but... I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Grandson thought it was great. Needed help from his Dad - who immediately ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson thought it was great. Needed help from his Dad - who immediately took it over. Both are having fun with the toy. Amazing what it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Murphy

customer_reviews.title: It made my son's Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to my 6 year old son for Christmas and it's a big hit! He got a mip last year, and the two can play together. The miposaur is a bigger hit than the mip. We love being able to roll the ball and it will follow it. Worth the money (more so than the regular mip).
customer_reviews.author: Tephiebird

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy for 5+ years!
customer_reviews.text: What a great toy. My son is only 5 but loves it. We can him Max the Mip becaue he has so much personality and what a great dancer! All my sons friends want one now. Easy to use and no set up at all if you're only using the control ball. A great toy and VERY well made especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nad L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t function as described beyond 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my grandsons birthday. It worked as described for two months then it isn’t performing as described. It doesn’t track or connect to the ball. We are totally disappointed in this item especially for the price paid, would not recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Sears

customer_reviews.title: The top Christmas gift in our household
customer_reviews.text: Incredible toy. Our 6 year old got it for Christmas and it was a huge hit. He loves the different modes and we like that it's interactive and encourages active play... it's not just sitting in front of a video game or iPad zoning out... Wowwee also makes robots and we are planning to give one to our daughter for her upcoming birthday. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: H Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fun gadget
customer_reviews.text: My five year old nephew loves this which was given as a Christmas present. It was one of his favorites and even when a five year old cousin broke off the tail, (almost immediately, after she began playing with it), I was pleased to find that it easily reattached and play could continue. The adults even had a good time giving it commands.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Robot Dino
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves dinosaurs & robots, so this was his dream come true. Easy to learn the commands & lots fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi R.

customer_reviews.title: YASSSSSSSSSS Great Dino Robot
customer_reviews.text: My son really wanted a robot so we got one on amazon and it was AWEFUL. So we returned it and came across this one. It was more than I wanted to spend but it is SOOOO worth it. Both my 4 year old boy and 7 year old daughter thought this was super cool and loved the variety of interactive things it does while leaving lots of room for make believe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Prybylo

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to buy batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old godson. The other reviews weren't kidding when they said it's hard to get out of the box! Once you get it out of the box it's ready to go in a minute. Honestly, I'm 25 and I got a kick out of it, it's a pretty cool device with a bunch of different modes. The iPhone app is super awesome so don't forget about that.
customer_reviews.author: Sink

customer_reviews.title: But she absolutely loved this and was very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this miposuar. This is not the one she picked out for Christmas but the one she wanted had to be put together with very small parts and I knew that was going to be a nightmare. But she absolutely loved this and was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my 7 year old son for Christmas. He had been eyeing it at Costco for a while. Awesome toy for the price. His favorite is putting it in dance mode!
customer_reviews.author: Steven LaFollette

customer_reviews.title: Rawrr
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son for Christmas. I hope he loves it! We HAD to take it out when he was at school to play with it :D It's so cute! I love the ball mode where Miposaur goes around and chases it.I have a feeling my son is going to love it. He asked Santa for a dinosaur, and boy, he got one :)
customer_reviews.author: DreamaBird

customer_reviews.title: Jurassic park and Miposaur
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas present for our grandson. It is awesome when used with the iPad app. As with most kids toys it has gotten limited use after the first couple of months but it still works great. We watched Jurassic World on HBO last week and Miposaur was out of the closet, charged and running around the house again.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R

customer_reviews.title: Cool robotic dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: the Miposaur is very fun! I am 12 years old. I like it because it is realistic with the moods. I really like dinosaurs in general too. I think the sensor is really cool with the hand gestures and obstacles in roam mode. It can balance standing and looks cool. I hope you get one!(for your own good!) I recommend getting the rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Piearson

customer_reviews.title: Really fun, interactive toy that I bought for my 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Really fun, interactive toy that I bought for my 7 year-old's birthday. I love how interactive the Miposaur is with my son, whether following him around the house or obeying his commands on his tablet. A great techy toy for my tech-loving kid!
customer_reviews.author: WashingtonMama

customer_reviews.title: Hit of Xmas morning!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this robot!!!! My son got this, Mip and Chip for Xmas. Dino and Mip are his favorite. He loves that we can battle, race and interact. Works great!! Easy to drive and follows commands perfectly. Highly recommend this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great toy that gives hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids have a blast with this Miposaur. I downloaded the app on her iPod Touch and I also have one on my iPhone. They play with it for hours. It's fun to watch them having fun with it. I highly recommend it. My grand kids are 9 and 12.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Crazy annoying and just bad design overall
customer_reviews.text: The toy falls over a lot and can't bring itself back upright. I end up many times just running over to the damn thing just to set it up again. Crazy annoying and just bad design overall. I can see very little testing was done on this toy before release.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Fun! But we've had to open it up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun! But we've had to open it up and fix gear placement multiple times. Bad gear design!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck Getting It to Respond
customer_reviews.text: It does not respond to commands easily! You really need to shake the heck out of the little controller to get it to respond. My son lost interest in Miposaur after a few hours to shaking the ball trying to get it to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Seeker

customer_reviews.title: This is a very fun toy my kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fun toy my kids loved it! Works well, fully functional. I wouldn't suggest for under the age of 5 year though. Only because it doesn't feel like if it is thrown a dozen times it will withstand the abuse. It is a very cool toy though!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingFrenzy

customer_reviews.title: Daughter has had a lot of Fun with this
customer_reviews.text: It works with hand commands or with the ball. Cute. Takes some learning, and patience to get the hang of but once you know the commands it is fun. Does not work well on carpet, unless it is really flat.
customer_reviews.author: ASM_ME

customer_reviews.title: Fun little robot
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to make him do everything they say he can do. He's not as responsive as I thought he would be. But it's fun to see his personality change with actions. And it's easy for my small child to operate most motions.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. My 6 year old loves it, even if we just turn it on and leave it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Erinn Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It's AWESOME It doesn't pick up every time
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about this but my 5 yr Old has been using his toy dinosaur as a pet, and it doesnt do anything and then I came across this. It's AWESOME It doesn't pick up every time, but a great deal of it and my son thinks it's awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
